first_para: Lindsay Geoffrey Whittle is a Welsh politician, a member of Plaid Cymru and an Assembly Member (AM) for the South Wales East electoral region in the National Assembly for Wales.

full.extract: Lindsay Geoffrey Whittle is a Welsh politician, a member of Plaid Cymru and an Assembly Member (AM) for the South Wales East electoral region in the National Assembly for Wales.
full.title: Lindsay Whittle
